title: Auth Signatory - Verify New Apply button saves and closes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row
AND user clicks the "Add" button in the Stored Signature column
AND draws a signature in the signature box
AND user clicks "Save"
custom_expected: THEN the signature box will close and the signature will be saved

title: Salary Structures - Club is able to add multiple rows and Save or Cancel all Changes at once
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
AND clicks it again
custom_expected:
THEN the user can edit multiple rows
AND hit save or cancel all changes
AND the effect will be applied to all rows

title: User can use advanced search for filter for contracts and add C's

GIVEN User is logged in as Club/BOC
AND Goes to Advanced Search
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects addendum C Search For option
AND selects any filter
AND Clicks Search
custom_expected: THEN Results for filtered addendum C's should appear

title: Club cannot edit contract once its terms submitted (except for comments execution and sections)
Club cannot see other ORGs Add C until approved
Club A cannot view Club B MNCs in Advanced Search unless Terms Accepted
Club A cannot view/edit Add C's for another Club
custom_preconds: Club A cannot view/edit Add C's for another Club, unless the ADD C is Approved, in which case Club A can view the ADD C but not edit it.

title: Club A cannot esign documents for another club
As a Club, I want to enter the Mexican Assignment agreement amounts into a player's 1st yr intl and non 1st yr contract
custom_steps:
**Wireframe:**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=mexican_assignment_agreement

**AC**
- For 1st yr international contracts and Non 1st yr contracts, both Club and BOC users have access to a new section called "Mexican Assignment Agreement"
- It is always hidden behind the "Add Section" button by default and does not appear on the screen
- If added, it is ordered right after Addendum A but before Addendum B. It can be toggled off or removed from the contact after adding.
- The section has 2 fields "Assignment Fee" and "Portion of Fee passed to Player"
- Both fields are required, have red asterisks and trigger required field warnings if not populated
-  Both fields are $ fields only accept positive number values. Commas should be auto-inserted
- This section can be saved to the contract like all other sections. If added and toggled to no, it should be removed once contract reaches Terms Submitted
- Dave to document how this info will be ETL'd back to ebis 1 to make the signing bonus utility work?

Note
- No impact to printed contract

title: As a club, I want only limited users to have permissions to create and edit stored e-signatures (read-only)
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged as a read only club with esig permissions
custom_steps: WHEN I view Esign
custom_expected:
THEN Read only e-sig users can see the Player, club and Authorized signatory widget but do not have access to any buttons. Checkboxes are not visible
AND Read only e-sig users cannot see E-sign button on forms
AND Read only e-sig users cannot see the "new" button on transactions, contracts and Add C forms next to the Authorized signatory field

title: As a club, I want only limited users to have permissions to create and edit stored e-signatures (admin)
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club with admin esign permissions
custom_steps: WHEN I view Esign
custom_expected: THEN I have access to all e-sig functionality including player and club e-sig widgets, e-sig buttons on forms, the Authorized signatory widget and the "new" option on forms

title: As a club, I want to give some users read only access to Minor league contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as read-cin-mnc/journal2810
custom_steps: WHEN user views ebis
custom_expected:
THEN the user can view MNC widgets and records but has no edit or state change functionality
AND on contract forms and Addendum C forms, the Edit button, all state change buttons, and E-sign button are not visible. The Print and close buttons continue to stay visible and usable
AND user can view Contract History on player profile but does not have access to Create New button
AND on the Add C widget and Salary structure widget, read only users can see the results but have no buttons. All checkbox selection fields are also hidden
AND user can use MNC advanced search
AND user can receive MNC related notifications and can delete their own notifications (notifications are account specific)
AND user can see Signatories & Negotiators widget but no edit permissions

title: As BOC, I want to give read only access to some users to Minor league contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC read only account
custom_steps: WHEN I login with this account
custom_expected:
THEN I can do the following -
-View MNC widgets but cannot edit anything
-Viewing contracts and Add C's, only print and close buttons available
-Can veiw contract history but NO create new button
-Can see approvals widget but no buttons
-Can receieve notifications
-Cannot see esign or auth sig widget YET

For each section of the contract, section will show FIRST in ENGLISH version, followed immediately by SPANISH version...

example: Add B- English version

title: Club can print the execution page of the contract
custom_preconds:
Link to Template: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347096?projectId=14044
Link to Sample: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347185?projectId=14044
Li​nk to Report details: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347095?projectId=14044
custom_steps: WHEN user hits Print
custom_expected:
THEN all behavior listed in Report Details for Execution of Contract should be met except for any E-sig related notes, parental consent and commissioners stamping
AND data on printed Execution of Contract should match with what was entered into EBIS.
AND the Execution of Contract should be laid out as shown in the template.
AND any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF
AND ff English only, then it should fit on one page.  
AND there should be space left for Commissioner's stamp section at the bottom of the page.
AND any changes made to the contract by club/BOC any state should reflect the changes in the PDF when you hit PRINT again

title: BOC Can return a terms accepted/pre approved to club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN  Boc user has contract in following states:
1. TERMS ACCEPTED 
2. Pre-Approved
custom_steps:
for TERMS ACCEPTED:
1. click Pre-Approve dropdown menu option on the side of Pre-Approved button
2. click "RETURN TO CLUB" 

for PRE-APPROVED
1. click "APPROVE" dropdown menu option on right side of APPROVE button
2. click "RETURN TO CLUB"
custom_expected:
1. Contract status will update to "ACCEPTED: UPDATE TERMS ACCEPTED"
2. Initiating club will receive notification in "ACTION ITEMS" widget (clipboard)
3. Name HYPERLINK will direct to player profile page in same tab
4. Description HYPERLINK will open MN contract in same window tab

AND the form reloads in view mode

title: BOC wants to approve a single Add C

AND if it is pressed in Edit mode, any changes are saved and the form reloads in view mode
AND all rule checks are run as if from the add-C widget ([overridable warnings](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/suites/view/1363&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=11989) and [hard errors](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/suites/view/1363&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=11988))
AND the Add C shows up black in contract history
AND blue notification appears

As a club, I want underage players to provide parental consent even if this is not their first contract
custom_steps: **AC**- If player is signing a Non first year contract and is under the age of 21 as of the Signing Date, show the parental consent section on the contract.- If Parental consent section is not filled out, show hard error. See #120701699- On printing the contract, the Parental consent section must print

title: As a club, I want the new CSP clause on a contract to be in accordance with the new CBA
custom_steps:
**Wire**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=college_scholarship

**AC**
- Effective from May 1st , first yr dom and first yr intl contracts should show the CEP clause instead of the CSP clause.
- Up until the effective date, the CSP clause should function as is
- The CEP clause should appear in the same position as CSP but with the updated title "Continuing Education Program"
- The CEP clause only has two fields "Tuition Allowance" and "Living Allowance"
- Both fields are number fields only and should auto-populate commas. They should accept cent values
- There a total field that shows the total of both amounts and is calculated automatically by the system once user has entered values into one or both fields.
- The language selection field should be updated to show/default to the new BOC CEP language option. Language is titled "BOC - Continuing Education Program mUPC". There is no Custom language option
- The language should also be viewable through the language viewer. The language copy is attached to this story
- Contract can be saved and moved through all state changes with this new clause

title: As a Club, I want the new CSP language to print on a contract in accordance with the new CBA
custom_steps:
**AC**
- If the CEP clause is added in place of the CSP clause, the CEP language should print on the MNC contract
- The place holder fields for Tuition and Living allowance, and the total amount should be replaced with the values entered in the UI by the user
- Font, formatting and spacing should be consistent with the rest of the contract
- Blank MNC report should also be updated with the new CEP clause in place of CSP as of the effective date (currently day 1 of 2017 draft)

Note
Language attached as a comment to this story

custom_steps: Related to https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-19234

custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-19234|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-19234|smart-link] 

Datafix all existing Contracts to update

title: As a MNC Admin, I want report/code updated to include new Terms Resubmitted state
custom_steps: AC: - Identify any places that look for Terms Accepted or Update Terms Accepted state - Make updates to ensure Terms Resubmitted contracts are included with the others

title: As a MNC Admin, I want to receive a Clipboard Notification when a MNC is moved to Terms Resubmitted
custom_steps: Clipboard Notifications #9: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784810/Minor+Contracts+-+ClipboardAC: - When a MNC is moved to Terms Resubmitted state, a clipboard notification will be generated for the BOC - The Notification will match the requirements in the provided documentation

title: As an MNC Admin, I want Rule Checks to run when a MNC moves to Terms Resubmitted state
custom_steps: Rules: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784601/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmitAC: - MNC On Submit rules will fire when a MNC is moved from Update Terms Accepted to Terms Resubmitted state

title: INC0168411 - As an MNC Admin, I want a new Terms Resubmitted state
custom_steps: Description:  Currently, if the BOC sends a Terms Accepted MNC back to the club in "Update Terms Accepted" state and the club resubmits, the MNC is returned to Terms Accepted.  This makes it difficult for the BOC Admin to know they need to review the updates.AC:* There will be a new Terms Resubmitted state created in the MNC Stateflow* It can only be accessed from the Update Terms Accepted state* Both Club and BOC users may make this transition* If the MNC is in "Terms Resubmitted" BOC may move it back to "Update Terms Accepted" or forward to "Terms Accepted"Flow:* Terms Accepted reject to Update Terms Accepted* Club resubmits to Terms Resubmitted (Rule checks run)* BOC accepts and returns to Terms Accepted.

title: As a MNC Admin, I want the system to prevent players from signing as SFNY if their season has started
custom_preconds:
AC:

* On submit, the system will perform a rule check to confirm the League the player is being assigned to hasn't started
* If the "Sign for Next Year" checkbox is checked, and the the Signing Date is on or after the earliest game date for the League of the Affiliate the player is being assigned to, the system will return a error message:
** "This player may not be added as a SFNY Player to the \[Affiliate Name] as the \[Affiliate's League] has begun play."
* The error will be a hard error for club users
* The error will be a warning for BOC users (Ignore & Continue)
* Don't fire in the negative case

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Sign For Next Year Checkbox Players to have a Sign For Following Season Transaction
custom_preconds:
Rule 10.3.7: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784593/10.+Pre-Approve+-+State+Change+rules

AC:
 - If a player has the "Sign For Next Year" checkbox checked, the signing will function as if the contract was being signed with a start year of the next calendar year
 - When moving from Terms Submitted to Pre-Approved, a "Sign for Following Year" transaction will be created if the box is checked

title: As a MNC Admin, I want the system to prevent an Org from having more than 50 SFNY players at a time
custom_preconds:
Rule 5.24: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784601/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmit|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784601/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmit|smart-link] 

AC:

* On submit, the system will perform a rule check to confirm how many SFNY the signing org has
* If the "Sign for Next Year" checkbox is checked, and the org has >= 50 SFNY, the system will return a error message:
** "This player may not be signed for next year as the signing org is currently at the maximum number of SFNY Players.
* The error will be a hard error for club users
* The error will be a warning for BOC users (Ignore & Continue)

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Add C's status to update to Expired when the MNC they are attached to Expires
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - When an MNC expires, all Add C that are attached to the contract will have their statuses updated to Expired
 - We should data fix all existing Add Cs to Expired if their MNC is expired
 - The initial C signed with the MNC should also be updated to Expired
  -- Not a separate field on the UI, but is a separate field in LINK
 - All Cs should be re-cached for Link (with their new Expired statuses) when the MNC expires

title: As a MNC Admin, I want to sign a player as SFNY after Jan 1
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When signing a player to an International 1st Year contract, if the current date is prior to the "Minor Contracts can be created for next year" system date, there will be a "Sign For Next Year" checkbox in the Contract Details portion of the Addendum A section.
* The checkbox will be available after January 1st, which is the current cut off for signing players for the next year
* Players signed to a contract with the "Sign For Next Year" checkbox checked will be given a SFNY roster status
* The checkbox will be visible until the "Sign for next year system date"

title: As an MNC Admin, I want Parents/Guardians to be able to esign a player's MNC
custom_steps:
AC:

If a Parent/Guardian Consent is required on an MNC, there will be a Parental/Guardian line in the esign modal
In the modal, the name on the Parent/Guardian line will reflect the option that was chosen in the UI (i.e. Mother or Father)
When ‘Email’ is selected for Parent/Guardian, Email and Phone Number fields will be displayed
- Both will be required
- Neither will be pre-populated with any information
Email notification will be sent to both the player and the parent at the same time
When the contracts are sent out for signature, two rows will appear in the Player E-Signature widget on the e-sign dashboard
- The parent/guardian row will show with “ - P/G” appended after the player name
Both parties will need to follow the normal two factor authentication process for esign
Player will esign process will remain unchanged
Parent/Guardian will only be able to esign fields on the Parent/Guardian Consent page of the contract
- Date
- Signature
When the player signs, the corresponding row will be removed from the Player E-Signature widget
When the Parent/Guardian signs, the corresponding row will be removed from the Player E-Signature widget
After both signers have completed the e-sign process, a row will appear in the Club E-Signature widget
The stamping, submission, approval process will proceed as usual from this point forward

title: MNC E-sign testing - 1st Year intl MNC
custom_steps:
-E-sign button will be available on MNC in any states where the print button is also available, see: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784672/MNC+Buttons+by+State|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784672/MNC+Buttons+by+State|smart-link] 
-user must have EBIS-MNC-ESIGN individual perm (already added to boc approver in dev, can be added to individual club accounts as needed)
-workflow will follow the global e-sign workflow including player signature and club stamping of the MNC(documentation here: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3788242/EBIS4-SET-464+Use+Cases)|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3788242/EBIS4-SET-464+Use+Cases)]
-this should be tested at least once using the e-sign over email function(only once since there are limited licenses for email function)
-when issues are found comment the issue below including the MNC URL, also upload the PDF of the MNC with issues to this drive: [https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1Wcsd9nJ52fzECj80tePXRN18xALypftu|https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1Wcsd9nJ52fzECj80tePXRN18xALypftu] and reference the document by name in your comment
-this ticket should be used to track ALL issues found with 1st Year International MNCs

title: As a MNC Admin, I want ebis to have a help doc on the help page
custom_steps:
AC:
 - The MNC esign Help Doc (to be provided) will be available on the help page in ebis

title: As an MNC Admin, I want the esign button hidden in Preliminary
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When an MNC is in Preliminary state, there will be no esign present on the contract
 - Once the contract reaches Terms Submitted State, the esign button will appear

title: As a MNC Admin, I want an esign disclaimer to appear on esigned MNCs
custom_steps:
AC:
 - The following disclaimer will appear on every signature page in an MNC:
  -- English: "By providing my electronic signature and selecting the Submit button below, I accept these terms and conditions as if physically signed by me in writing."
  -- Spanish: "Al proporcionar mi firma electranica y seleccionar "submit" abajo, acepto estos tÃ©rminos y condiciones como si hubiera firmado por escrito fÃ­sicamente."

title: As a MNC esigner, I want to opt out of the Life Insurance program while esigning the contract
custom_steps:
AC:
 - While esigning the Life Insurance Consent Form on a MNC, the "Check here if you do NOT wish to participate." will be an a checkbox
 - The checkbox will be optional
